name: Dictation (Speech Recognition)
author: GEAR invent!

sections.description:
Dictation (Speech Recognition) adds an interactive MIC icon to the wordpress editing screens. When editing a Post or Page just click on MIC icon and start talking.

The plugin will automatically insert the converted text from voice into your blog!

Key Features

  • Dictation (Speech Recognition) is based on the latest Google API
  • WordPress MultiSite compatible
  • Custom post types are supported
  • Easily use your voice in the standard post edit and page edit screens
  • Real-time voice to text converter using Chrome on Desktop

Home Page |
Documentation |
FAQ |
Support

Upgrade

  1. Deactivate your old version
  2. Follow the installation instructions to install the new version
sections.installation:
See full Installation intructions and Documentation
1. Install and activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
2. You should now see a MIC icon in the ‘edit posts’ screen

Documentation |
FAQ |
Support

short_description: Dictation (Speech Recognition) is the most popular and easiest way to Write a POST with your voice, converting voice on text with any language.
